0.title: Level 1 - Host
0.query:
fetch dt.entity.host | filter osType != "ZOS"
| lookup [
    timeseries {cpu=avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), mem=avg(dt.host.memory.usage)}, by:{dt.entity.host}
    | fields timeframe,interval, entityName(dt.entity.host), dt.entity.host,  cpu, mem
], sourceField: id, lookupField:dt.entity.host
| summarize {cpu.max = max(arrayMax(lookup.cpu)), cpu.avg = avg(arrayAvg(lookup.cpu)),mem.max = max(arrayMax(lookup.mem)), mem.avg = avg(arrayAvg(lookup.mem))}, by:{id, entity.name}
| fields entity.name, id,cpu.avg, cpu.max, mem.max, mem.avg 
| fieldsAdd status_cpu=if(cpu.max>95, "游댮", else:if(cpu.max>50, "游리", else:"游릭") ), status_mem=if(mem.max>95, "游댮", else:if(mem.max>50, "游리", else:"游릭") ) 
| fieldsRemove cpu.avg,cpu.max,mem.max,mem.avg
| fieldsAdd status_host= if (status_cpu=="游댮" or status_mem=="游댮", "游댮", else: if(status_cpu=="游리" or status_mem=="游리","游리", else:"游릭"))
| sort status_cpu,status_mem asc
| fieldsSummary status_host 
| expand values, limit: 3  | fieldsFlatten values
| sort values.value asc
| limit 1
| fields field, values.value

3.title: Level 2 - Host stats
3.query:
fetch dt.entity.host | filter osType != "ZOS"
| lookup [
    timeseries {cpu=avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), mem=avg(dt.host.memory.usage)}, by:{dt.entity.host}
    | fields timeframe,interval, entityName(dt.entity.host), dt.entity.host,  cpu, mem
], sourceField: id, lookupField:dt.entity.host
| summarize {cpu.max = max(arrayMax(lookup.cpu)), cpu.avg = avg(arrayAvg(lookup.cpu)),mem.max = max(arrayMax(lookup.mem)), mem.avg = avg(arrayAvg(lookup.mem))}, by:{id, entity.name}
| fields entity.name, id,cpu.avg, cpu.max, mem.max, mem.avg 
| fieldsAdd status_cpu=if(cpu.max>95, "游댮", else:if(cpu.max>50, "游리", else:"游릭") ), status_mem=if(mem.max>95, "游댮", else:if(mem.max>50, "游리", else:"游릭") ) 
| fieldsRemove cpu.avg,cpu.max,mem.max,mem.avg
| fieldsAdd status_host= if (status_cpu=="游댮" or status_mem=="游댮", "游댮", else: if(status_cpu=="游리" or status_mem=="游리","游리", else:"游릭"))
| sort status_cpu,status_mem asc

5.query:
fetch dt.entity.host | filter osType != "ZOS"
| lookup [
    timeseries {cpu=avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), mem=avg(dt.host.memory.usage)}, by:{dt.entity.host}
    | fields timeframe,interval, entityName(dt.entity.host), dt.entity.host,  cpu, mem
], sourceField: id, lookupField:dt.entity.host
| summarize {cpu.max = max(arrayMax(lookup.cpu)), cpu.avg = avg(arrayAvg(lookup.cpu)),mem.max = max(arrayMax(lookup.mem)), mem.avg = avg(arrayAvg(lookup.mem))}, by:{id, entity.name}
| fields entity.name, id,cpu.avg, cpu.max, mem.max, mem.avg 
| fieldsAdd status_cpu=if(cpu.max>95, "游댮", else:if(cpu.max>50, "游리", else:"游릭") ), status_mem=if(mem.max>95, "游댮", else:if(mem.max>50, "游리", else:"游릭") ) 
| fieldsRemove cpu.avg,cpu.max,mem.max,mem.avg
| fieldsAdd status_host= if (status_cpu=="游댮" or status_mem=="游댮", "游댮", else: if(status_cpu=="游리" or status_mem=="游리","游리", else:"游릭"))
| sort status_cpu,status_mem asc

6.content:
Thresholds for the host stats:
* CPU status : Red > 95, Orange > 50, Green
* Memory status : Red > 95, Orange > 50, Green

8.title: Level 2 - Service avail.
8.query:
fetch dt.entity.service
| lookup [
timeseries {
    operand1 = sum(dt.service.request.failure_count),
    operand2 = sum(dt.service.request.count)
  }, by:{dt.entity.service}, bins: 60, nonempty: true
  | fieldsAdd failureRate_timeseries = operand1[] / operand2[]  * 100
  | fieldsRemove operand1, operand2 ], sourceField: id, lookupField:dt.entity.service
| summarize {failurerate_avg.avg = avg(arrayAvg(lookup.failureRate_timeseries))}, by:{id, entity.name}
| fields entity.name, id,failurerate_avg.avg=100-failurerate_avg.avg
| fieldsAdd status_failurerate=if(failurerate_avg.avg>98, "游릭", else:if(failurerate_avg.avg>90, "游리", else:"游댮") ) 
| fieldsRemove failurerate_avg.avg
| fieldsAdd status_service= if (status_failurerate=="游댮" , "游댮", else: if(status_failurerate=="游리", "游리", else:"游릭"))
| sort status_service asc

15.title: Level 1 - Server avail.
15.query:
fetch dt.entity.host | filter osType != "ZOS"
| lookup [
 timeseries avail=max(dt.host.availability, rollup:sum) , by:{availability.state,dt.entity.host} | fieldsAdd intervalToMinutes = toLong(interval)/60000000000 | fieldsAdd m1 = if(avail[]>intervalToMinutes, intervalToMinutes, else: avail[]) | fieldsAdd avail=(avail[]/intervalToMinutes)*100 | fieldsAdd metricName = "up"
 ], sourceField: id, lookupField:dt.entity.host
| summarize {avail.max = max(arrayMax(lookup.avail)), avail.avg = avg(arrayAvg(lookup.avail))}, by:{id, entity.name}
| fields entity.name, id,avail.avg, avail.max
| fieldsAdd status_avail=if(avail.max>98, "游릭", else:if(avail.max>90, "游리", else:"游댮") )
| fieldsRemove avail.max,avail.avg
| fieldsAdd status_host= if (status_avail=="游댮" , "游댮", else: if(status_avail=="游리" ,"游리", else:"游릭"))
| sort status_avail asc
| fieldsSummary status_host 
| expand values, limit: 3  | fieldsFlatten values
| sort values.value asc
| limit 1

16.content:
Thresholds for the server status:
* availability status : Green > 98, Orange > 90, Red

29.title: Level 1 - Synthetic
29.query:
fetch dt.entity.http_check
| lookup[
    fetch events
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","游댮", else: "游리"), display_id, event.id
    ], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids
| fieldsAdd status_synthetic=if(isNotNull(lookup.status),lookup.status, else: "游릭" )
| fieldsAdd event.id=lookup.event.id
| fields entity.name, id, status_synthetic
| sort status_synthetic
| fieldsSummary status_synthetic 
| expand values, limit: 3  | fieldsFlatten values
| sort values.value asc
| limit 1

30.content:
Thresholds for the process status:
* availability status : Green = no detected problem, Red = detected problem

34.title: Level 0
34.query:
fetch dt.entity.host | filter osType != "ZOS"
| lookup [
    timeseries {cpu=avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), mem=avg(dt.host.memory.usage)}, by:{dt.entity.host}
    | fields timeframe,interval, entityName(dt.entity.host), dt.entity.host,  cpu, mem
], sourceField: id, lookupField:dt.entity.host
| summarize {cpu.max = max(arrayMax(lookup.cpu)), cpu.avg = avg(arrayAvg(lookup.cpu)),mem.max = max(arrayMax(lookup.mem)), mem.avg = avg(arrayAvg(lookup.mem))}, by:{id, entity.name}
| fields entity.name, id,cpu.avg, cpu.max, mem.max, mem.avg 
| fieldsAdd status_cpu=if(cpu.max>95, "游댮", else:if(cpu.max>50, "游리", else:"游릭") ), status_mem=if(mem.max>95, "游댮", else:if(mem.max>50, "游리", else:"游릭") ) 
| fieldsRemove cpu.avg,cpu.max,mem.max,mem.avg
| fieldsAdd status_host= if (status_cpu=="游댮" or status_mem=="游댮", "游댮", else: if(status_cpu=="游리" or status_mem=="游리","游리", else:"游릭"))
| sort status_cpu,status_mem asc
|fieldsRemove status_cpu,status_mem | fieldsRename status=status_host
| append [

| lookup [
timeseries {
    operand1 = sum(dt.service.request.failure_count),
    operand2 = sum(dt.service.request.count)
  }, by:{dt.entity.service}, bins: 60, nonempty: true
  | fieldsAdd failureRate_timeseries = operand1[] / operand2[]  * 100
  | fieldsRemove operand1, operand2 ], sourceField: id, lookupField:dt.entity.service
| summarize {failurerate_avg.avg = avg(arrayAvg(lookup.failureRate_timeseries))}, by:{id, entity.name}
| fields entity.name, id,failurerate_avg.avg=100-failurerate_avg.avg
| fieldsAdd status_failurerate=if(failurerate_avg.avg>98, "游릭", else:if(failurerate_avg.avg>90, "游리", else:"游댮") ) 
| fieldsRemove failurerate_avg.avg
| fieldsAdd status_service= if (status_failurerate=="游댮" , "游댮", else: if(status_failurerate=="游리", "游리", else:"游릭"))
| sort status_service asc

]

]

| lookup [
 timeseries avail=max(dt.process.availability, rollup:sum) , by:{availability.state,dt.entity.process_group_instance} | fieldsAdd intervalToMinutes = toLong(interval)/60000000000 | fieldsAdd m1 = if(avail[]>intervalToMinutes, intervalToMinutes, else: avail[]) | fieldsAdd avail=(avail[]/intervalToMinutes)*100 | fieldsAdd metricName = "up"

| sort status_avail asc
|fieldsRemove status_avail | fieldsRename status=status_process]

| append [
/////////////////
fetch dt.entity.http_check
| lookup[
    fetch events
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, display_id, event.id
    | sort timestamp desc
    | dedup   affected_entity_ids, event.status
    | fields affected_entity_ids,  status=if(event.status =="ACTIVE","游댮", else: "游리"), display_id, event.id

| fieldsAdd status_synthetic=if(isNotNull(lookup.status),lookup.status, else: "游릭" )
| fieldsAdd event.id=lookup.event.id
| fields entity.name, id, status_synthetic
| sort status_synthetic
| fieldsRename status=status_synthetic]
